author: gregames
msg: FreeBSD sendfile: return an error if the kernel returns 0 & no bytes sent.
This probably means the file became smaller after it was stat()ed.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: This particular code fragment gets an award for obfuscated code to save a
few cycles.  Add a description in plain english so we don't have to waste
*our* cycles figuring out what this optimization is doing.  (Every time I
come back to this section, I get confused and the old comment isn't helpful.)

author: jwoolley
msg: It doesn't really *have to* be in fcntl.h, it just probably will be
